text: Lupe Rosalía Arteaga Serrano de Fernández de Córdova (born December 5, 1956) is an Ecuadorian politician. She was the country's first female president for only two days in 1997. Arteaga became president when Abdalá Bucaram left office. Arteaga was born in Cuenca, Ecuador. ==Other websites== *Encyclopædia Britannica - About the Editorial Board *Short Biography Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:People from Cuenca, Ecuador
title: Rosalía Arteaga
